official-title.#text:
To specify requirements for the next update of the current strategic plan for the Office of Rural
			 Health of the Department of Veterans Affairs for improving access to, and
			 the quality of, health care services for veterans in rural areas.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Rural Veterans Health Care Improvement Act of 2014

short-title.#text: Rural Veterans Health Care Improvement Act of 2014

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Requirements in connection with next update of current strategic plan for Office of Rural Health of
			 the Department of Veterans Affairs

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
after the date of the
			 enactment of this Act, whether an update or refresh of such Strategic Plan
			 Refresh or a strategic plan to supersede such Strategic Plan Refresh,
			 shall be prepared in accordance with this section.

text.#text: Procedures for soliciting from each
A statement of the clinical capacity of such facility.

The procedures of such facility in the event of a medical, surgical, or mental health emergency
			 outside the scope of the clinical capacity of such facility.

The procedures and mechanisms of such facility for the provision and coordination of health care
			 for women veterans, including procedures and mechanisms for coordination
			 with local hospitals and health care facilities, oversight of primary care
			 and fee-basis care, and management of specialty care.
